com.cmput301w15t15.travelclaimsapp.model

Interface Listenable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Claim, ClaimList, Destination, DestinationList, Expense, GeoLocation, Tag, TagList, User

    public interface Listenable
    Listenable, defines the functions required for implement classes that can have listeners. Intended to use for managing Listener objects

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(Listener listener)
      Use for adding Listener objects to class
      void deleteListener(Listener listener)
      Use to delete listeners attached to object implementing interface
      void notifyListeners()
      Use when object attributes have been changed, to notify listeners
      void setListeners()
      Use for setting listener array in objects that implement this interface
